content: The Gold Tree Core is one of the special advanced materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for upgrades like many of the other materials in the game and can be found several times in one through.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gold_Tree_Core.md', within the main section titled 'Gold Tree Core'.
The content is as follows:
The Gold Tree Core is one of the special advanced materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for upgrades like many of the other materials in the game and can be found several times in one through.
